subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: On Monday, the Red Sox committed nearly $200 million to sign Pablo Sandoval and Hanley Ramirez in moves that resembled Yankees tactics of the past. But the Yankees barely flinched.
snippet: On Monday, the Red Sox committed nearly $200 million to sign Pablo Sandoval and Hanley Ramirez in moves that resembled Yankees tactics of the past. But the Yankees barely flinched.
